data.name: Hentai VR 4
data.detailed_description:
In this game, you can enjoy an erotic experience that is so realistic and immersive you will forget it is virtual.
With VR, you can experience pleasures beyond what is possible in the real world. There has never been anything quite like this — it's the ultimate entertainment experience!

How to play:
You can move freely in the VR space, jump to platforms, grab lights and dance.
You can also fool around with beautiful naked women and enjoy naughty play.


Persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

data.short_description: The ultimate sexy VR game is here! Prepare to experience VR like never before! A world of pleasures that you have never experienced before is waiting for you — just put on your VR headset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
